Package Accounts

Class SavingsAccount

java.lang.Object
Accounts.BankAccount
Accounts.SavingsAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
public non-sealed class SavingsAccount extends BankAccount
This class creates a savings account in the bank system.
Version:
1.0.1
Author:
Lucas Hartman

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface Blueprints.Printable

    currency, percent

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SavingsAccount(String fn, String ln, String an)
    This constructor takes on the first and last name and account number to set up the account It sets the balance to 0, minimum required balance to 300 and interest rate to .1%
    SavingsAccount(String fn, String ln, String an, double b, double balance, double rate)
    This constructor takes on all the parameters to set up a full savings account

  • Constructor Details

    • SavingsAccount

      public SavingsAccount(String fn, String ln, String an, double b, double balance, double rate)
      This constructor takes on all the parameters to set up a full savings account
      Parameters:
      fn - a String of the first name
      ln - a String of the last name
      an - a String of the account number
      b - a double of the starting balance
      balance - a double of the minimum balance required for the savings account to have
      rate - a double for the interest rate to earn off the balance

    • SavingsAccount

      public SavingsAccount(String fn, String ln, String an)
      This constructor takes on the first and last name and account number to set up the account It sets the balance to 0, minimum required balance to 300 and interest rate to .1%
      Parameters:
      fn - a String for first name
      ln - a String for last name
      an - a String for account number

  • Method Details

    • getMinimumBalance

      public double getMinimumBalance()
      This returns the minimum balance required for the savings accoung
      Returns:
      a double for the minimum balance

    • setMinimumBalance

      public void setMinimumBalance(double minimumBalance)
      This will set a new minimum balance that is sent.
      Parameters:
      minimumBalance - a double for the new minimum balance

    • getInterestRate

      public double getInterestRate()
      This will return the interest rate of the savings account
      Returns:
      a double for the interest rate on the account

    • setInterestRate

      public void setInterestRate(double interestRate)
      This will set a new interest rate
      Parameters:
      interestRate - a double value to set for the interest rate.

    • checkMinimumBalance

      public boolean checkMinimumBalance()
      This method checks to make sure the current balance is above the minimum required balance. If it is below there will be $5 charge on the account.
      Returns:
      a boolean value of True if above the minimum balance, false otherwise

    • applyMonthlyInterest

      public void applyMonthlyInterest()
      This method will apply the interest earned on the account by multiplying balance by interest and creditting to the account.
      Specified by:
      applyMonthlyInterest in class BankAccount

    • toString

      public String toString()
      This method will print the savings account
      Overrides:
      toString in class BankAccount
      Returns:
      a String of the savings account
